sentences.en: A man with no experience can only display his mediocrity and immaturity.
sentences.cn: 单一即意味着平庸,意味着幼稚.

sentences.en: Despite the immaturity of knowledge management technologies, the benefits they offer demand your attention.
sentences.cn: 尽管知识管理技术尚末成熟,但它们带来的好处已要求你重视它们.

sentences.en: Enlightenment is man's leaving his self - caused immaturity.
sentences.cn: 启蒙乃是人脱离其 自我 导致的不成熟状态.

sentences.en: I'm tired of your immaturity. Why do not you grow up?
sentences.cn: 我真厌倦了你的幼稚无知, 你为什么就不能长大一些 呢 ?

sentences.en: Immaturity is the inability to use one's understanding without guidance from another.
sentences.cn: 不成熟就是不经他人的指引就无法运用自身的理解力.

sentences.en: It traces the development of a young man from immaturity to maturity.
sentences.cn: 它描写一位青年从不成熟到成熟的发展过程.

sentences.en: Nonreactivity may be related to fetal immaturity, a sleep cycle, drugs, fetal anomalies, or fetal hypoxemia.
sentences.cn: 可能与胎儿不成熟, 处于睡眠周期, 药物作用, 胎儿异常或胎儿缺氧有关.

sentences.en: Photographs of the boy showed his physical immaturity.
sentences.cn: 该男孩的那些照片显示了他生理上的不成熟。

sentences.en: Politics is usually the executive expression of human immaturity.
sentences.cn: 政治通常是人类不成熟的表现行为.

sentences.en: Some bad factors in the family have close relation to the immaturity crimes.
sentences.cn: 家庭环境中的一些不良因素与未成年人犯罪有密切的联系.

sentences.en: Yet it is simple immaturity, rather than too much cash, that explains the roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 但实际上, 造成这种过山车式市场行情(涨和下跌都很快)不是过多的流动资金, 而是市场的不成熟.

sentences.en: Youth ages, immaturity is outgrown, ignorance can be educated and drunkenness sobered, but stupid lasts forever.
sentences.cn: 年纪会增长 、 幼稚会成熟, 无知可以教育,酒醉也会清醒, 但是愚蠢却无药可救.

words.tran_cn: 不成熟的；未成熟的；粗糙的
未成熟；粗糙；未臻完美；不完全

trans.tran_cn: 不成熟，未充分成长，未成熟，粗糙
trans.tran_en: Immaturity is the state of being not yet completely grown or fully developed
